title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 April 2016 - XWiki
content:

13:07 <M-jsimard> has joined #xwiki  
15:01 <acotiuga> Hello!  
15:02 <vmassol> hi  
15:02 <acotiuga> Could anyone take a look on this PR: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/481 ? I would like to go forward and update the objects in the applications which are configurable in admin UI. Thanks!  
15:04 <vmassol> I probably won't have the time today on my side. The important part acotiuga is that this doesn't break any existing extension  
15:05 <acotiuga> I see, thanks  
15:13 <msmeria> has quit  
15:46 <martinus\_\_> has quit  
15:46 <martinus\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:46 <vmassol> back to fixing the platform build  
15:48 <Enygma`> has quit  
15:49 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <vmassol> Could someone check http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-flamingo-skin-test-tests/2783/testReport/ ? Enygma`, any idea?  
15:55 <D-Spair> has quit  
15:58 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
16:13 <lkrejci> has quit  
16:13 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
16:16 <Enygma`> vmassol: yes, I`ve applied that PR and looks like it was probably not taking care of waiting for the rename operation to finish with progress information  
16:16 <Enygma`> I`ll ping msmeria about it  
17:03 <vmassol> Enygma`: k thanks  
18:09 <ClemensR> has quit  
18:10 <woshilapin> has quit  
18:12 <lkrejci> has quit  
18:12 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
18:14 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:19 <vmassol> Enygma`: regarding the thread about the url format for temporary resources  
18:20 <vmassol> you didn't reply to my last comment. Are you ok with the solution of a custom serializer/resolver for URLs (for the entity reference segment)?  
18:21 <vmassol> Also I'd like to know if I've been able to convince you that the URL format I've proposed is simpler than a unique id? :)  
18:21 <vmassol> (not just simpler but also the other arguments)  
18:22 <vmassol> actually I don't think it matters much FTM  
18:22 <vmassol> since this is an internal format that we can change at any time  
18:24 <Enygma`> vmassol: I will have to get back to you on that one, later this evening once I`ll catch up on the thread  
18:24 <Enygma`> I`m not a fan of having too many formats for the same thing, but I`ll see the details there  
18:26 <Enygma`> gtg  
18:27 <vmassol> Enygma`: there'll be only one format  
18:27 <vmassol> that's the goal of what I'm doing actualy  
18:28 <vmassol> \*actually  
18:28 <vmassol> (and supporting nested spaces)  
18:28 <vmassol> k thanks  
18:31 <Enygma`> has quit

21:00 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki  
21:04 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
21:15 <boubou> anyone can confirm me that my message was sent to the xwiki mailling list ?  
21:15 <boubou> vmassol are u there ?  
21:19 <vmassol> hi boubou  
21:19 <boubou> hi sir  
21:20 <vmassol> you can check that using http://xwiki.markmail.org/search/?q=  
21:20 <vmassol> if you don't see your message there then it's not been received  
21:20 <boubou> what is the address should I send my message ?  
21:21 <vmassol> see http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/MailingLists  
21:21 <vmassol> (check the warning too before sending ;))  
21:23 <boubou> :)  
21:23 <vmassol> just received it  
21:23 <boubou> sure  
21:23 <vmassol> sebastien boulianne?  
21:23 <boubou> then could u hep me a bit plz ?  
21:23 <boubou> sure ;)  
21:23 <boubou> its me  
21:23 <vmassol> sorry I can(t help you  
21:23 <vmassol> I know nothing about ldap and xwiki  
21:23 <vmassol> :)  
21:24 <vmassol> but there are plety of docs  
21:24 <vmassol> \*plenty  
21:24 <boubou> :'(  
21:24 <vmassol> I knw there's a debug option  
21:24 <boubou> for real ?  
21:24 <boubou> hummm  
21:24 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Authentication#HEnableLDAPdebuglog  
21:25 <boubou> thx  
21:25 <boubou> I found I can do that thru the GUI, I tried but it didnt work too  
21:26 <boubou> its why I decided to write toi the mailling list  
21:28 <vmassol> it's not indicated in your mail  
21:28 <vmassol> got to go now, good muck!  
21:28 <vmassol> \*luck ;)  
21:29 <boubou> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/LDAPAuthenticationUseCases  
21:29 <boubou> I also tried with that link...
